text: Safo" va "Marva" az nisonahoi [zohiri sariati] Alloh taolo ast. Pas, har ki hacci xona [-i Ka'ʙa] jo umra ʙa coj meovarad, ʙar u gunohe nest, ki tavofi [sa'j] ʙajni on duro [niz] ancom dihad [va in kor az raftorhoi cohilijat sumorida namesavad] va kase, ki ʙa majli xud kori neke ancom dihad, pas, [ʙidonad, ki] ʙe tardid Alloh taolo siposguzori donost
